title: Quarkus Cli Update downgrades project version
body:
### Describe the bug

quarkus update with Quarkus CLI version 3.3.1 downgrades project quarkus version from 3.2.2.Final to 3.1.2.Final.

> PS C:\ws\eclipse-git\Tresorreport Service Quarkus\tresorreport.rest> quarkus update
> [INFO] Error stacktraces are turned on.
> [INFO] Scanning for projects...
> [INFO] 
> [INFO] --------------------< com.freier:tresorreport.rest >--------------------   
> [INFO] Building tresorreport.rest 2.0.0-SNAPSHOT                                  
> [INFO]   from pom.xml                                                             
> [INFO] --------------------------------[ jar ]---------------------------------   
> [INFO]                                                                            
> [INFO] --- quarkus-maven-plugin:3.3.1:update (default-cli) @ tresorreport.rest ---
> [WARNING] quarkus:update goal is experimental, its options and output might change in future versions
> [INFO] Looking for the newly published extensions in registry.quarkus.io
> [INFO] Detected project Java version: 17
> [INFO] Instructions to update this project from '3.2.2.Final' to '3.1.2.Final':
> [INFO] Recommended Quarkus platform BOM updates:
> [INFO] Update: io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-bom:pom:3.2.2.Final -> 3.1.2.Final
> [INFO]
> [INFO] Resolved io.quarkus:quarkus-updates-recipes:1.0.4 with 0 recipe(s) to update from 3.2.2.Final to 3.1.2.Final (initially made for OpenRewrite MAVEN plugin version: 4.46.0) 

### Expected behavior

quarkus update updates to quarkus version 3.3.*

### Actual behavior

Quarkus update downgrades to quarkus version 3.1

### How to Reproduce?

1. project config like:
![image](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/assets/60612641/170a9f16-76ea-4c15-838a-9668dce6935e)

2. quarkus update

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "17.0.8" 2023-07-18 OpenJDK Runtime Environment Temurin-17.0.8+7 (build 17.0.8+7)                   OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM Temurin-17.0.8+7 (build 17.0.8+7, mixed mode, sharing)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.2.2

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.8.8 

### Additional information

quarkus version
3.3.1
